request.title: LAN VPN Interface GRE Schema
request.description: LAN VPN Interface GRE schema for request

tunnelRouteVia.description: <1..32 characters> Interface name: ge0/<0-..> or ge0/<0-..>.vlanid
<1..32 characters> Interface name: ge0/<0-..> or ge0/<0-..>.vlanid
<1..32 characters> Interface name: ge0/<0-..> or ge0/<0-..>.vlanid
<1..32 characters> Interface name: ge0/<0-..> or ge0/<0-..>.vlanid

tcpMssAdjust.description: TCP MSS on SYN packets, in bytes

tcpMssAdjustV6.description: IPv6 TCP MSS on SYN packets, in bytes

clearDontFragment.description: Enable clear dont fragment (Currently Only SDWAN Tunnel Interface)

ikeCiphersuite.description: IKE identity the IKE preshared secret belongs to

preSharedSecret.description: Use preshared key to authenticate IKE peer

ikeLocalId.description: IKE ID for the local endpoint. Input IPv4 address, domain name, or email address

ikeRemoteId.description: IKE ID for the remote endpoint. Input IPv4 address, domain name, or email address

ipsecReplayWindow.description: Replay window size 32..8192 (must be a power of 2)

documentation.description: This is the documentation for request schema for LAN VPN GRE Interface
documentation.details-1: variable name should be present with given format as specified in schema if optionType value is variable
documentation.details-2: variable name should not be present if optionType value is NOT variable
documentation.details-3: when option Type is global,  value should be present with given format/restrictions as specified in schema
documentation.details-4: when option Type is default, value should be present with given default value as specified in schema
